attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Put in the passport form that pictures that have countersignatory must be written in the boundery of the image taken! Useless government MAKE IT EASIER FOR A UK ADULT CITEZEN TO GET HIS FIRST PASSPORT!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
